description: Fashionable and charming, Nobu is Risa`s best friend. She is generally wiser than Risa or Chiharu in the ways of love, and is always ready to offer her advice. She`s mostly the one who sets up all the `alone time` moments with Risa and Ootani, but it usually ends up failing and Risa goes back to her for comfort.
name: Ishihara Nobuko
